name: Sarah Collins
duties: is responsible for overseeing the overall direction and vision of the company, developing business strategies and fostering partnerships, and managing high-level decision-making and operations.

name: Mark Thompson
duties: is responsible for communicating with clients to understand their travel preferences and needs, planning and organizing personalized travel itineraries, and providing clients with information on destinations, accommodations, and travel services.

name: John Martinez
duties: is responsible for ensuring smooth day-to-day operations of the agency, handling vendor relationships and negotiating deals with travel partners, and monitoring customer service performance and satisfaction.
